CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK(Implementation__r.Funding_Call_Date_Time__c), "", CASE( MONTH(DATEVALUE(Implementation__r.Funding_Call_Date_Time__c)), 1, "January", 2, "February", 3, "March", 4, "April", 5, "May", 6, "June", 7, "July", 8, "August", 9, "September", 10, "October", 11, "November", "December" ) & " " & TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(Implementation__r.Funding_Call_Date_Time__c))) & ", " & TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(Implementation__r.Funding_Call_Date_Time__c))) & " " &
IF( OR( AND( Implementation__r.Funding_Call_Date_Time__c >= DATETIMEVALUE($Setup.Daylight_Savings__c.DST_Start__c), Implementation__r.Funding_Call_Date_Time__c < DATETIMEVALUE($Setup.Daylight_Savings__c.DST_End__c) ) ),
TEXT(IF(VALUE(MID(TEXT(Implementation__r.Funding_Call_Date_Time__c - 7/24), 12, 2)) = 0, 12, VALUE(MID(TEXT(Implementation__r.Funding_Call_Date_Time__c - 7/24), 12, 2))) - IF(VALUE(MID(TEXT(Implementation__r.Funding_Call_Date_Time__c - 7/24), 12, 2)) <= 12, 0, 12)) & ":" & MID(TEXT(Implementation__r.Funding_Call_Date_Time__c), 15, 2) & IF(VALUE(MID(TEXT(Implementation__r.Funding_Call_Date_Time__c - 7/24), 12, 2)) < 12, "AM", "PM") & ", PDT", TEXT(IF(VALUE(MID(TEXT(Implementation__r.Funding_Call_Date_Time__c - 8/24), 12, 2)) = 0, 12, VALUE(MID(TEXT(Implementation__r.Funding_Call_Date_Time__c - 8/24), 12, 2))) - IF(VALUE(MID(TEXT(Implementation__r.Funding_Call_Date_Time__c - 8/24), 12, 2)) <= 12, 0, 12)) & ":" & MID(TEXT(Implementation__r.Funding_Call_Date_Time__c), 15, 2) & IF(VALUE(MID(TEXT(Implementation__r.Funding_Call_Date_Time__c - 8/24), 12, 2)) < 12, "AM", "PM") & ", PST" ) )
CustomField.label: 3rd Call Time
